```{r setup}
library(tibble)
library(stargate)
```


```{r}
n <- 1e3
df <- tibble(
    x1 = rnorm(n),
    x2 = rnorm(n),
    x3 = rnorm(n),
    e  = rnorm(n),
    y  = x1 - 2 * x2 + 3 * x3 + e
)

m1 <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, df)
m2 <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + x3, df)
m3 <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 * x3, df)
```


```{r}
sm1 <- sg_model(m1)
sm2 <- sg_model(m2)
sm3 <- sg_model(m3)
```


```{r}
st <- sg_table(m1, sm2)
st <- sg_table(st, m3)
st
```


```{r}
st <- sg_rename(st, stats = sg_standard_stats())
st
```


```{r}
sft <- sg_format(st, nsmall = 3)
sft
```


```{r}
library(kableExtra)
kbl(sft) |> 
    kable_classic() |> 
    row_spec(5, hline_after = TRUE)
```
